snippet: After recalculating data, climatologists have declared that Oklahoma last year suffered through the hottest summer ever recorded in the United States — not Texas as initially announced last fall.
abstract: Climatologists, after recalculating data, declare that Oklahoma in 2011 suffered through the hottest summer ever recorded in the United States--not Texas as initially announced in fall 2011.
lead_paragraph: After recalculating data, climatologists have declared that Oklahoma last year suffered through the hottest summer ever recorded in the United States — not Texas as initially announced last fall.

headline.main: Oklahoma: 2011 Brought Hottest Summer on Record
